hero.title: TURNES MAKINA
hero.subtitle: We provide precision manufacturing solutions for the aerospace and defense industry. With 25 years of experience, we produce the most complex parts with high precision.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Precision manufacturing since 2016
about.description: As Turnes Makina, we provide CNC turning, milling and wire EDM services. With our modern machine park and expert team, we take part in the most critical projects of the aerospace and defense industry.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Precision manufacturing with state-of-the-art CNC machines
